# Introduction

The January 2025 Apprenticeship program is now running! 
All are welcome to join our daily workshops.
You can access the schedule and workshop materials [here](apprenticeship_2025h1).

# Workshop schedule

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
rio::import("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qY-Fj_ck1O-hV2BS-Oc789CcATXvCXApenSRjfyliqk/edit?gid=525811222#gid=525811222", sheet = "Schedule") |> 
  mutate(across(everything(), ~str_remove(., ".*\\?") |> 
                  str_replace("^\\s*$", "TBA"))) |> 
  gt::gt() 
```
